title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Tbe claim of the high-spirited chief was necessarily admitted, andthe MacDonalds of Glencoe mounted guard on the bouse of Newliston ; nor was there the leastarticle deranged or destroyed.

title: Tales of a Grandfather ... [ser. 1-3.] With notes.
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Angus and Arran, who were still closely leagued together, encountered Lennox, with an inferior force, near the village of Newliston.

title: The Prose Works of Sir Walter Scott. (Supplementary volume: containing notes, historical and illustrative, by the author, glossary, etc.)
author: Scott, Walter
snippet: Angus and Arran, who were still closely leaguedtogether, encountered Lennox, with an inferior force,near the village of Newliston.
